title: What is the Madrid tennis schedule?
description: The Mutua Madrid Open continues on Wednesday, when Indian Wells champion Jack Draper faces 11th seed Tommy Paul and sixth seed Alex de Minaur closes the day against 10th seed Lorenzo Musetti. De Minaur is aiming to avenge his Monte-Carlo semi-final loss to Musetti earlier this month. The Italian won in a deciding-set tie-break, improving to 2-1 in their Lexus ATP Head2Head series. Draper and Paul will clash for a sixth time on Manolo Santana Stadium. Frances Tiafoe faces Matteo Arnaldi, who upset Novak Djokovic in the second round. Grigor Dimitrov faces lucky loser Gabriel Diallo. View Wednesday's full order of play below. ORDER OF PLAY - WEDNESDAY, 30 APRIL 2025 Manolo Santana Stadium - start 1:00 PM WTA - [5] Madison Keys (USA) vs [2] Iga Swiatek (POL) Not Before 4:00 PM ATP - [5] Jack Draper (GBR) vs [11] Tommy Paul (USA) Not Before 8:00 PM WTA - [1] Aryna Sabalenka or Peyton Stearns (USA) vs [24] Marta Kostyuk (UKR) or Anastasia Potapova Not Before 9:30 PM ATP - [6] Alex de Minaur (AUS) vs [10] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) Arantxa Sanchez Stadium - start 1:00 PM ATP - [16] Frances Tiafoe (USA) vs Matteo Arnaldi (ITA) Not Before 3:00 PM WTA - [7] Mirra Andreeva vs [4] Coco Gauff (USA) WTA - Moyuka Uchijima (JPN) or [21] Ekaterina Alexandrova vs [17] Elina Svitolina (UKR) Not Before 7:30 PM ATP - [15] Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) vs [LL] Gabriel Diallo (CAN) Stadium 3 - start 1:00 PM ATP - Alexander Erler (AUT) / Constantin Frantzen (GER) vs [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR) ATP - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs Jamie Murray (GBR) / Rajeev Ram (USA) ATP - Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR) vs Christian Harrison (USA) / Evan King (USA) ATP - [Alt] Fernando Romboli (BRA) / John-Patrick Smith (AUS) or Maximo Gonzalez (ARG) / Andres Molteni (ARG) vs Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Ben Shelton (USA) or [8] Nathaniel Lammons (USA) / Jackson Withrow (USA) Court 5 - start 1:00 PM WTA - [3] Su-Wei Hsieh (TPE) / Jelena Ostapenko (LAT) vs Beatriz Haddad Maia (BRA) / Laura Siegemund (GER) WTA - Sorana Cirstea (ROU) / Anna Kalinskaya vs Linda Noskova (CZE) / Clara Tauson (DEN) ATP - Andre Goransson (SWE) / Sem Verbeek (NED) or Jakub Mensik (CZE) / Adam Pavlasek (CZE) vs [WC] Romain Arneodo (MON) / Manuel Guinard (FRA) or [3] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER) [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Madrid

Quarter-final spots on the line Wednesday

April 29, 2025

Getty Images

The 2025 Mutua Madrid Open will be held from 23 April-4 May. By ATP Staff

The Mutua Madrid Open continues on Wednesday, when Indian Wells champion Jack Draper faces 11th seed Tommy Paul and sixth seed Alex de Minaur closes the day against 10th seed Lorenzo Musetti.

De Minaur is aiming to avenge his Monte-Carlo semi-final loss to Musetti earlier this month. The Italian won in a deciding-set tie-break, improving to 2-1 in their Lexus ATP Head2Head series. Draper and Paul will clash for a sixth time on Manolo Santana Stadium. Frances Tiafoe faces Matteo Arnaldi, who upset Novak Djokovic in the second round. Grigor Dimitrov faces lucky loser Gabriel Diallo.

View Wednesday's full order of play below.

ORDER OF PLAY - WEDNESDAY, 30 APRIL 2025
Manolo Santana Stadium - start 1:00 PM
WTA - [5] Madison Keys (USA) vs [2] Iga Swiatek (POL)

Not Before 4:00 PM
ATP - [5] Jack Draper (GBR) vs [11] Tommy Paul (USA)

Not Before 8:00 PM
WTA - [1] Aryna Sabalenka or Peyton Stearns (USA) vs [24] Marta Kostyuk (UKR) or Anastasia Potapova

Not Before 9:30 PM
ATP - [6] Alex de Minaur (AUS) vs [10] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA)

Arantxa Sanchez Stadium - start 1:00 PM
ATP - [16] Frances Tiafoe (USA) vs Matteo Arnaldi (ITA)

Not Before 3:00 PM
WTA - [7] Mirra Andreeva vs [4] Coco Gauff (USA)
WTA - Moyuka Uchijima (JPN) or [21] Ekaterina Alexandrova vs [17] Elina Svitolina (UKR)

Not Before 7:30 PM
ATP - [15] Grigor Dimitrov (BUL) vs [LL] Gabriel Diallo (CAN)

Stadium 3 - start 1:00 PM
ATP - Alexander Erler (AUT) / Constantin Frantzen (GER) vs [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN) / Henry Patten (GBR)
ATP - [1] Marcelo Arevalo (ESA) / Mate Pavic (CRO) vs Jamie Murray (GBR) / Rajeev Ram (USA)
ATP - Joe Salisbury (GBR) / Neal Skupski (GBR) vs Christian Harrison (USA) / Evan King (USA)
ATP - [Alt] Fernando Romboli (BRA) / John-Patrick Smith (AUS) or Maximo Gonzalez (ARG) / Andres Molteni (ARG) vs Rohan Bopanna (IND) / Ben Shelton (USA) or [8] Nathaniel Lammons (USA) / Jackson Withrow (USA)

Court 5 - start 1:00 PM
WTA - [3] Su-Wei Hsieh (TPE) / Jelena Ostapenko (LAT) vs Beatriz Haddad Maia (BRA) / Laura Siegemund (GER)
WTA - Sorana Cirstea (ROU) / Anna Kalinskaya vs Linda Noskova (CZE) / Clara Tauson (DEN)
ATP - Andre Goransson (SWE) / Sem Verbeek (NED) or Jakub Mensik (CZE) / Adam Pavlasek (CZE) vs [WC] Romain Arneodo (MON) / Manuel Guinard (FRA) or [3] Kevin Krawietz (GER) / Tim Puetz (GER)
